column5: Anybody have any suggestions on  a good place to pick one up?  Is anyone familiar with Boston whalers? do they need a certain style trailer?  Thanks,  Sudzy
You looking for new or used?? Check out Ben's Marine in Oro-Medonte on Hwy 11. bensmarine.ca Tell him Bruce with the Larson sent you.
I have a 13' sport it sits on a bunk style trailer
